title: In Phoenix, Super Bowl Madness In Full Swing
teaser: Super Bowl madness is in full swing in Phoenix, where the majority of fans have flocked for Sunday's championship. Budget hotels have suddenly turned pricey, buildings have been covered in sponsors' colors â€” and there's even some references to the two teams competing in the game.
